__TOC__



This page lists intends to give an overview of things we would like to work on and where you can help out. 

If you intend to work on any of these, please mark them as Work in Progress on the wiki page. If you need help, just ask on `#ubuntu-bugs` on `irc.freenode.net`. We're happy to help you get started.
